name: The Wastelands
description: A post-apocalyptic wasteland where survivors struggle to rebuild civilization. Mutants, raiders, and ancient technology pose constant threats.

entities.name: The Scrap City
entities.summary: A settlement built from the ruins of the old world, constructed entirely from salvaged materials. It's a chaotic mix of makeshift buildings and ancient technology.

entities.name: The Radiation Zone
entities.summary: A highly contaminated area where the old world's nuclear facilities once stood. Mutants and strange creatures are common here, but valuable pre-war technology can be found.

entities.name: The Oasis
entities.summary: One of the few places in the Wastelands with clean water and fertile soil. Heavily defended by the largest settlement, it's a beacon of hope in the desolate landscape.

entities.name: Radiation Mutants
entities.summary: Horrifying creatures mutated by exposure to radiation. They come in many forms - some are barely human, others are completely alien. They are aggressive and territorial.

entities.name: Scavenger Bots
entities.summary: Pre-war robots that still patrol the wasteland. Some are helpful, others are hostile. They often guard valuable technology and resources from the old world.

entities.name: Sand Worms
entities.summary: Massive creatures that burrow through the wasteland. They are attracted to vibrations and can swallow entire vehicles. Travelers fear them above all other threats.

entities.name: The Scavengers
entities.summary: A loose coalition of traders and explorers who brave the wasteland to find valuable pre-war technology. They are the primary source of advanced equipment in the Wastelands.

entities.name: The Raiders
entities.summary: Violent gangs that prey on settlements and travelers. They are well-armed and ruthless, taking what they want by force. Many settlements live in fear of their raids.

entities.name: The Rebuilders
entities.summary: A group dedicated to restoring civilization in the Wastelands. They protect settlements, maintain the Oasis, and work to create a better future for all survivors.
